page.title: 05Religion
page.content: The first{Methodist Church }was opened in{1870}on the site where the present hall now stands in Dukes Ride and was rebuilt in{1895.}In{1984}they had an extension on the front porch during which time they found a time capsule in the wall which contained coins and newspapers dated{1895.}These have been put back in the roof space together with coins and newspapers dated{1984. } In {1914}the first Baptist Service was held in the{Oddfellows' Hall.}The present day{Baptist Church}which is in the High Street was opened in{ 1954. {Ravenswood School}is a village for mentally handicapped people. {85%}of the residents are{Jewish}and every Friday their Lecture Room is used as a {Synagogue.
